backend/main.mo: Defines a canister with access-controlled user profile and CV management, including CRUD operations and photo upload using ExternalBlob storage.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature-to-file mappings, components, and test coverage for implemented authentication and CV builder features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten one-line summaries for key frontend files used in authentication, CV editing, previewing, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and OKLCH-based color variables for light and dark themes with base styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point defining the root element and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level app component handling authentication state, conditional routing, and profile setup modal display.
Header dropdown showing authenticated user's name and initials with logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for first‑time users to enter and save their display name with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/cv/CVForm.tsx: Main CV form component collecting personal details, photo, summary, experience, and skills with editable sections.
frontend/src/components/cv/CVPreview.tsx: Renders a styled CV preview card showing photo, contact info, summary, work experience, and education from form data.
frontend/src/components/cv/PhotoUploader: Handles image upload with validation, progress tracking, preview display, and removal for profile photos.
frontend/src/components/cv/RepeatableLis: Reusable editor for adding, updating, and removing list items using custom render logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current Internet Identity, invalidating related queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCVData.ts: Provides hooks to fetch, save, and clear CV data using the backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, handling login, logout, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Hooks for fetching and updating the caller's user profile through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles plus custom CSS variables, theming, and print-specific rules for CV output.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the main component.
frontend/src/pages/CVBuilderPage.tsx: Page component that loads, edits, and saves user CV data, mapping backend fields to form state and providing preview, validation, and print functionality.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Displays a styled login screen using Internet Identity with a sign‑in button and feature highlights.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility module for reading, storing, and clearing URL and sessionStorage parameters, including hash‑based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and theme settings with custom plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing current project features, requirements, and pending feature requests for the CV maker app.
